definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: The paper studies dynamic characteristic for industrial steam turbine digital electro hydraulic governing system.
sentences.chinese: 研究了工业汽轮机数字电液调节系统的动态特性。

sentences.english: The turning direction of this water turbine is overlook clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 水轮机旋向为俯视顺时针。

sentences.english: Then the steam passes into the turbine.
Third Officer, please inform Chief Engineer of standby engine by 1300 LT.
sentences.chinese: 三副，请通知轮机长在当地时间1300时前备车。

sentences.english: The moist fuel gas from the drying operation is combusted to drive the turbine.
sentences.chinese: 从操作的干燥潮湿气体燃料燃烧来驱动涡轮机。

sentences.english: Chinese wind-turbine makers are starting to export.
sentences.chinese: 中国的风力涡轮机开始进行出口。

sentences.english: In Hanwang, there was a saying that it was enviable to be a worker ofDongfang.
sentences.chinese: 在汉旺，东方汽轮机厂的工人是很令人羡慕的。

sentences.english: A wind turbine requires at least an acre of property as well as other location criteria.
sentences.chinese: 一个符合标准的风流涡轮机至少需要一英亩的地方。

sentences.english: Gradually, Li felt at home with the factory and the life.
sentences.chinese: 渐渐地，李万胜把东方汽轮机厂当成了自己的家。

sentences.english: This article proposes an improved mehodof selecting the desirable type and parameter for a reaction turbine.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种改进的反击式水轮机选型方法。

sentences.english: Denmark is home to the world's largest wind turbine manufacturer, Vestas.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦是世界最大风力涡轮机制造商维斯塔斯的家乡。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the fault diagnostic expert system that includes system structure, function and self-study capacity for gas generator.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一个适用于燃气轮机的故障诊断专家系统。

sentences.english: GE will provide four gas turbine modules per vessel.
sentences.chinese: 通用海事公司将为每艘舰艇提供四种燃气轮机模块。

sentences.english: Installation of a working wheel of the hydraulic turbine.
I do hope your chief engineer could see me on Friday morning.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望你们轮机长星期五早晨能见我。

sentences.english: The paper presents a successful try-out of using the boundary element method for the stress analysis of a steam turbine rotor.
sentences.chinese: 采用边界元法对汽轮机转子的应力场进行分析。

definition: to steer (a vessel)/to hold the rudder/at the helm
tugboat/boat towed by a tugboat/to tow a boat
